title: Thim zingah ka awm tawh a
lyrics:
Thim zingah ka awm tawh a,
Thimah ka awm a,
Tunah Lalpan min zawng hmu,
Min chhandam ta;
Nun dan danglam tak mai ka lo nei ta,
Engah ka awm ta.

Ka manganna zawng zawng pawh,
Manganna zawng zawng,
Tunah Lalpan min chhawk ta,
Min ngaidam ta;
Nun dan danglam tak mai ka lo nei ta,
Engah ka awm ta.

Rinawmin ka awm tah ang,
Rinawmin ka awm,
Tunah Lalpa ta ka ni,
Ka lawm em em;
Nun dan danglam tak mai ka lonei ta,
Engah ka awm ta.
